events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's explanation about receiving the wrong item.
The case has been assigned to agent John D. for handling the refund request.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you process your refund for the incorrect item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received instead of what you ordered?
Here is my order number 56789 and attached is the photo showing a completely different product from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund within 3-5 business days and you can keep the incorrect item as a goodwill gesture.
I appreciate your quick response and the option to keep the item. That works well for me, thank you!
The refund has been processed successfully and you should see the amount credited to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund is complete and you have no further questions, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
